messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/26/2003 12:08:57 AM Eastern Standard Time, ... Off topic, sorry, but our family Morris dances too Ann...well, me and the kids,...dad holds
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/26/2003 12:08:57 AM Eastern Standard Time,
anns@... writes:


> would talk (some) to her dad, and kept Morris (folk)
> dancing with him.

Off topic, sorry, but our family Morris dances too Ann...well, me and the
kids,...dad holds down the fort while we're gone. We do it in our 4H group,
along with Scottish and Irish dance. Any pics of your group?

Nancy
